backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining authorization, data types, and map‑based storage for businesses, profiles, services, clients, availability, and appointments, including profile query and save functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to related frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH-based light/dark theme tokens and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React router configuration handling authentication, onboarding, dashboard routes, and public booking pages.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header component showing branding, user info, and logout logic with special handling for public booking pages.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAppointmen: React Query hooks for fetching appointments and creating public bookings with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAvailabili: React Query hooks for retrieving and updating staff availability per business.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useBusinessPr: React Query hooks for fetching business profiles and creating new business records.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useClients.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch all clients and add a client, invalidating cache on updates.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useServices.t: Implements hooks to load all services and add a service using the actor, with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBusinessId.ts: Derives a stable business ID from the current user's principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Defines hooks to fetch and update the caller's user profile via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides identity context with login, logout, and AuthClient initialization logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/Appointment: Displays all appointments, resolves service and client names, highlights upcoming ones, and shows loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/Availabilit: Lets staff configure weekly availability, loading existing settings and saving updates via mutations.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/ClientsPage: Shows a client list and provides a dialog to add new clients with basic validation.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardLa: Provides dashboard navigation and renders the selected section using an Outlet.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/ServicesPag: Lists services and includes a dialog for adding new services with duration input.
frontend/src/pages/LandingSignInPage.tsx: Landing page UI that promotes features and triggers Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Handles initial user onboarding by saving profile data and creating a business.
frontend/src/pages/PublicBookingPage.tsx: Public-facing booking flow that loads business data, shows services, and submits appointment requests.
frontend/src/utils/dateTime.ts: Formats appointment timestamps and converts between dates and bigint timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/errorMessages.ts: Maps common error message patterns to user-friendly strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL parameter parsing, session persistence, and cleanup for routing contexts.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, metadata, required images, and a list of implemented features for an appointment scheduling app.
